DataSourceDatabase.SelectString: select * from (select c1.extid, c1.name, c1.datatype, c1.project, c1.uniquename, c1.CreationTime, c2.ExtID as parentExtID, c2.Project as parentProject, c1.AttrID from dwcatalog c1, (select * from dwcatalog union all (select 0, 'root', '', 0, 0, 'structure', '', '2000-05-30 11:47:30.000000', 'root', null)) c2 where c2.AttrID = c1.ParentID and c2.attrid >= ? ) t left outer join (select * from dwcatalognumdata) num on t.AttrID = num.AttrID order by t.attrid
